reviews.review: Şimdi oyunun soruny değil ama sanırsam sorun bende. Yıllardır FPS oyunlarınından oynamadığım oyun kalmadı ama Half Life 2 oynarken benim nedense midem bulanıyor gözlerim kararıyor elimde olan bişey değil bu. Bu yüzden bu oyuna çok yazık ettim ama cidden elimde değil.

Oddly shorter than I expected, (Keep in mind that I played easy mode), but still a worthwhile game to get on sale, but still a very enjoyable game with a great story, sometimes better character expressions than some moderns story-based games, and a chunk of assets for Garry's Mod! Definitely get this game!
La nostalgia de la mano, y la revolucion no solo de ciudad 17, si no del entorno y desarrollo de los videojuegos, auspiciados plenamente por Valve, nada mas que decir, juegazo por donde lo veas.
no tengo ni porque decirlo tu yo sabemos que el 85% de los usuarios de steam se crearon una cuenta para jugar a este grandioso y espectacular juego
Very cool gorgon friedman best game plyad evr!!!!!!

I hated half-life 1 and didn't finish it, this is a big improvement
pretty cool level design
fun physics puzzles and stuff
can run on absolute potatoes
some very frustrating/confusing parts, walkthroughs and save points can help 
overall pretty impressive for being released 17 years ago

good game, don't know if I would play more than once

One of the best game i ever played! 

If you don't know what is Half-Life, or you never played, just play it, you will not regret this!
Absolutely amazing for the year it came out. The physics, the weapons, the story. Everything amazing.

One of the best, if not the best game I've ever played in my life. Perfect atmosphere with soundtracks that suit every moment perfectly. Interesting characters. Excellent story, one of the reasons I get hooked to the game. Excellent and fun gameplay. I would recommend this game to anyone!

Очень хорошая игра, сюжет есть. Советую сыграть

Decidí probarlo antes de realizar un stream de este juego y puedo decir que es excelente, muy divertido, hay cosas que mejoran demasiado del primer half life a este, espero terminarlo en vivo y ojalá algún día se decidan a sacar half life 3

Mit der gesamten Portal-Reihe mein absolutes Lieblingsspiel. Die Achievments sind zwar mega verbuggt (Bekomme manche einfach erst Monate danach) bei mir, aber es macht mega viel spaß. Egal, wie oft man es spielt. :D

It's a sin to love videogames and at least not give Half Life 2 a try, since it's one of the best games ever made in the videogame industry. 

Story is way better than the one from the first game, being way more deep and developed. Gordon Freeman wakes up 20 years after the first game incidents and discovers Earth being controlled under the evil galactic empire the Combine. He meets his old friends from Black Mesa and decides to stop the aliens. 

Graphically is a wonder, even almost two decades later. The Source engine creates a depressing and devastated atmosphere matching the game plot. It also includes ragdoll physics, better water and better explosions. Valve really made a huge effort creating the ambience and has its merit.

Gameplay is similar to Half Life, but much better developed. HUD looks cleaner, the flashlights acts like a real flashlight and some weapons improved or give a new kind of gameplay. And yes, you can drive some vehicles along the game.

You can find the Xen aliens, but the Combine seems a better enemy, with different types of soldiers and vehicles such as an helicopter and a warship.

Game is fairly long enough and with balanced difficulty. You can finish it in 12 hours more or less, but to 100% it you might need a whole day.

It includes archievements, which some of them are really difficult (like searching the Lambda graffiti all along the adventure, and I made a guide to help find them all), but not impossible to get, and it also includes badges (in my opinion they are unnecesary if not because you can get emoticons and backgrounds for the profile).

And price it's really fair in my opinion. The game is complete enough to worth the 8,19€ it costs, but on sales the game can be really cheap, like less than 2€.

In conclusion, I think Half Life 2 is an excellent title to play if you love deep lore, FPS or in general, videogames. Valve really made a great job with this and no wonder why.

(i played on a alt i haven't finessed the story yet, also i played mmod because graphics the normal game is fine tho)

Помню в детстве играл в Half Life. Тогда я еще не знал что это вторая часть. Было весело гонять на багги по пескам и давить муравьев колесами. Недавно переиграл ее полностью и понял что ни фига не помню из детства про сюжет. Сюжет интересный с твистами. В дальнейшем планирую пройти Эпизод 1 и 2.

Time, Dr. Freeman? Is it really that time again? It seems as if you only just arrived. You've done a great deal in a small time span. You've done so well, in fact, that I've received some interesting offers for your services.

Это какой то шедевр! Я купил orange box по скидке за 435 руб. я рекомендую эту игру всем. Кому нравятся шутеры и огромный сюжет. Багов я не наблюдаю, и не видел. Это очень крутая и продуманная игра. Всем рекомендую купить. А так же советую скачать игру half life 2 update. Там улучшенная графика, и все точно также как и в обычной half life 2. В топ half life 2.
